product.name: Pressurized Handheld Multi-Surface Natural Steam Cleaner with 12 pcs Accessories, Multi-Purpose Steamer for Home Use, Steamer for Cleaning Floor, Upholstery, Grout and Car
product.description:
Powerful, high-pressure, high-temperature steam cleaner works to clean all kinds of hard surfaces in your home.
Since 2019, Phueut has been committed to delivering an exceptional shopping experience. We focus on continuous product development, design, and optimization to meet our customers' evolving needs. Our steam cleaners are highly regarded for their quality and performance, and we offer a range of compatible accessories for a complete experience. At Phueut, we're dedicated to expanding our product line to offer the best cleaning solutions.
Steamer for Cleaning your house, sofa and other hard to reach areas.
Multi-Surface Steam Cleaner is great for pet footprints, sinks, stoves, kitchen, windows, toilet,  bathroom, sofa and curtains fabrics.
Steam Cleaner with Window Cleaning Tool can be used to clean shower walls and doors, windows, mirrors and glass.
Steaner cleaning for car, home
The steam dissipates heat very quickly, so we recommend that you always keep the power on during use.
After use, the temperature of the residual steam inside the tank is still too high, please: 1.Unplug first 2.  Invert the steam cleaner, then keep pressing down to fully release the steam. 3. Open the lid 4. Add water into the steam cleaner.
We recommend using no more than 9.46OZ(280ML) of water. Exceeding this may cause leaks during heating or use. If you notice any leaks from the bottom or elsewhere, reach us immediately with pictures and videos by Phone or by contacting us
Leaving it for a long time may cause the lid difficult to open. Leaving it for a long time may cause the lid difficult to open. So please loosen the cap by one turn after each use.
Firstly, please press the" ON/OFF" Button，after pressing once, the air leak issue will disappear so you can using to clean your house.
If you still have this situation after pressing, please reach us at Email. We will help and solve this for you after receiving your message.
Please kindly check whether the safety cap is tight or not?  If not please cool down the device and reopen the cap and tight it.
NOTE: We do not recommend customer using the steam cleaner without tightening since it may get burned.
Windows, mirrors, shower walls and doors, glass cooktops, kitchen countertops, glass and marble tables, and any other non-porous, solid, flat surfaces for your house.
1050-Watt Powerful High-Pressure Steam Cleaner Powerful, high-pressure, high-temperature handheld steam cleaner works to clean a variety of surfaces for your house.
Floor grout, counters, backsplashes, sinks, faucets, ovens, oven hoods, stovetops, microwaves, windows, slider door tracks, and more.
This multipurpose handheld steam cleaner includes 12-in-1 cleaning capabilities Scrubbing Brushes tool so you could cleaner your house or car with so many tools.
Floor grout, counters, backsplashes, sinks, faucets, tubs, showers, shower doors, toilet exteriors, and more. For deep cleaning work and your house.
product.bullet_points:
• POWERFUL HOT STEAM - 1050 watts with 3-5 minutes fast heat-up and emits pressurized powerful hot steam 230℉ for up to 8-12 minutes
• MULTI-SURFACE CLEANING - Steamer is suited for virtually all hard surfaces including: ceramic, marble and sealed hard wood. It's great for tile, sinks, stoves, windows, sofa, toy and car
• CHEMICAL FREE & SAFE - Phueut steam cleaners for home use 100% Chemical free with no harmful fumes or residue. Safety child cap extra protects your families' safety! Healthy and friendly steamer for kids and pets
• LIGHTWEIGHT AND PORTABLE - Handheld design and compact body make it easy to carry around 9.8 ft power cord provides efficient operation and easily clean hard to reach areas. The lightweight cleaner design makes it convenient to carry from room to room
• 12-PIECE ACCESSORIES SET - This steam cleaner comes with exclusive free 12 pieces accessory kit, Includes 4 round brushes and other attachments to meet your different needs. Our all-in-one steamer can deep clean for your home
• TIPS - Simply twist the steam cleaner's safety cap until secure. Do not overtighten, too much force can break the rubber ring inside, causing the cap to fail and not seal properly. ▶If you cannot open the safety cap after using it, please try again in a few minutes. Open the safety cap only in case that power is cut down and steam inside cools down to avoid scald
• LARGE WATER TANK - Steam cleaner features a large water tank of 350ml capacity (recommended load capacity is within 280ml) which allows you to focus on cleaning, instead of refilling often. The ergonomic handle reduces hand strain, allowing for comfortable use even during extended cleaning sessions
features: POWERFUL HOT STEAM - 1050 watts with 3-5 minutes fast heat-up and emits pressurized powerful hot steam 230℉ for up to 8-12 minutes
MULTI-SURFACE CLEANING - Steamer is suited for virtually all hard surfaces including: ceramic, marble and sealed hard wood. It's great for tile, sinks, stoves, windows, sofa, toy and car

CHEMICAL FREE & SAFE - Phueut steam cleaners for home use 100% Chemical free with no harmful fumes or residue. Safety child cap extra protects your families' safety! Healthy and friendly steamer for kids and pets

LIGHTWEIGHT AND PORTABLE - Handheld design and compact body make it easy to carry around 9.8 ft power cord provides efficient operation and easily clean hard to reach areas. The lightweight cleaner design makes it convenient to carry from room to room

12-PIECE ACCESSORIES SET - This steam cleaner comes with exclusive free 12 pieces accessory kit, Includes 4 round brushes and other attachments to meet your different needs. Our all-in-one steamer can deep clean for your home

TIPS - Simply twist the steam cleaner's safety cap until secure. Do not overtighten, too much force can break the rubber ring inside, causing the cap to fail and not seal properly. ▶If you cannot open the safety cap after using it, please try again in a few minutes. Open the safety cap only in case that power is cut down and steam inside cools down to avoid scald

LARGE WATER TANK - Steam cleaner features a large water tank of 350ml capacity (recommended load capacity is within 280ml) which allows you to focus on cleaning, instead of refilling often. The ergonomic handle reduces hand strain, allowing for comfortable use even during extended cleaning sessions
